title: "How Voice Technology Is Reshaping Businesses"
excerpt: "It’s AI that makes voice tech as effective as it currently is. The voice recognition software is only part of the equation. The real utility here lies in the fact that AI can understand what you’re saying. As machine learning continues to improve, we’ll see voice tech becoming even more useful. Initially, voice tech seemed like passing fad."
